title: Leading convention centers in Canada as of June 2017 , by size
yAxis: Exhibition space in thousand square feet
summary: This bar chart has 10 categories for the x axis representing Buildings, and a y axis representing Exhibition space in thousand square feet.
The highest category is found at Enercare_Centre where Exhibition space in thousand square feet is 1000.0.
The lowest category is found at Vancouver_Convention_Centre where Exhibition space in thousand square feet is 311.5.
gold: This statistic shows the leading convention centers in Canada as of June 2017 , by size . The Enercare Centre and The Toronto Congress Centre were the largest convention centers in Canada at one million square feet each .
